news_header: Hamas postpones the release of Israeli hostages, citing Israeli ceasefire violations, as tensions rise between the two sides.
news_original_title: Hamas says it will postpone hostage release, blaming Israel
news_text: A spokesman for Hamas announced the postponement of the release of Israeli hostages, blaming Israeli violations of the ceasefire agreement. Three hostages are scheduled to be freed in exchange for Palestinian prisoners, but Israel's Defense Minister condemned this as a violation of the ceasefire. US President Trump suggested that the ceasefire should be canceled if all hostages are not returned by Saturday. The situation remains tense, with accusations exchanged between Hamas and Israel regarding compliance with humanitarian aid and hostage releases.
